string.text: Listen, the boys are planning an ambush and we need to get our hands on some disguises. Come through for us and we'll share you the haul we got from our last robbery.
Great! Here you go, as promised. Time to break out the old tailoring skills...
We knocked off a medical box not too long ago from some eggheads. Give the boys something to psych them up for the next hit and we'll give you some of the goods.
Can you bring me some silencers, bro? The guys want to hit some camps without bringing too much attention.
